description:
Observations to the London Borough of Hackney in connection with erection of part 10 and part 2 storey building to provide 1115m2 of Business (Class B1) floor space and 32 live/work units; demolition of existing buildings. 

 APPLICANTS' PLAN NOS.:  220B, 202C, 203C, 204C, 205C, 206C,                         207C, 208C, 209C, 210C, 211C, 226C,                         227C, 228C, 225C.
decision_conditions:
OBSERVATIONS 

 The Council consider that the proposal would be grossly out of scale with prevailing built form in the immediate vicinity. It would therefore have a negative impact on the townscape locally, on Rosemary Gardens opposite, and on the adjacent East Canonbury Conservation Area.
